meta.content: Website for Grosse Ile Township Schools

div.p: Grosse Ile Township Schools is closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

div.p:
Attached below is a comprehensive FAQ generated from our Townhall questions. If you have additional questions, please contact Audrie Kalisz.
Townhall FAQ

The Grosse Ile Township Schools Continuity of Learning Plan has been officially approved and can be viewed at the link below.
Learning Plan

The Grosse Ile Township Schools Board of Education work session will be held virtually at the link below on Tuesday, April 14, 2020.
Live Link
